text:
まだ
着かねぇの?
苦痛だよ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 44%;top: 4.8%;width: 80px;height: 60px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
ご不満なら、
帰ればいいと
私は思いますがね
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 66%;top: 6%;width: 121px;height: 82px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
あぁ全くな
俺自然嫌い
みたいだわ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 83%;top: 11.6%;width: 96px;height: 58px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
出てきなさい
少年。害意は
ありません…
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 80%;top: 36%;width: 112px;height: 58px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
まぁ害意が
あっても
君は何も
できませんが
style: font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 84%;top: 43%;width: 79px;height: 68px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
こいつが
例のガキ?
よし
style: font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 64.5%;top: 56%;width: 60px;height: 50px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;
